attributes.action: stop gordon brown pinching tax of those people who have a lovely garden!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I wish to stop the stupid tax on gardens.  When you buy a house the land comes with it!  Or you pay a small rental charge once a year to the firm who owns the land.  Stop this money grabbing man taking all our money.  Its not fair on single home owners like myself earning £16,500 paying child support and after bills having £200-£300 left in a month to get food petrol etc living in a 2 bed terraced.  My garden is my only pretty thing I can look at.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Gardens/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
